title: who designs the NBA Team logos
content:
Hi all,

Just wondering if anyone knows if the NBA team logos are designed by one company or by individual companies etc?

Any help would be great
author: TF22Raptor

comments.content: You might also want to ask this question over in the forum at [Chris Cramer's Sports Logos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201151014/http:/www.sportslogos.net/) site.
[Eric Rickabaugh](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201151014/http:/home.roadrunner.com/~rickabaugh/PortPS.html) does a lot of sports logos.
Thanks for the links guys, awesome.
